text: The 2003 FIA GT Magny-Cours 500 km was the second round the 2003 FIA GT Championship season. It took place at the Circuit de Nevers Magny-Cours, France, on April 27, 2003. ==Official results== Class winners in bold. car failed post-race technical inspection. The car's fuel tank was found to be larger than the rules allowed. ==Statistics== * Pole position – #23 BMS Scuderia Italia – 1:55.642 * Fastest lap – #23 BMS Scuderia Italia – 1:38.625 * Average speed – 151.380 km/h ==References== * * * M FIA GT
title: 2003 FIA GT Magny-Cours 500km
